The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 28 December is 1,999,728 (3,552.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 23 December, there were 226,191 new confirmed cases (401.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 16 December, there were 161,193 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 40% (64,998 extra cases).
